name: Shrek Sugar Fever
summary:
In the land of Far Far Away, a sweet spell has candified the kingdom, including Shrek’s swamp! Help Shrek rescue his sugar-crazed friends from their candy obsession in this addictive block puzzle saga!

Defeat the sugar rush and unsweeten Shrek’s swamp by matching and crushing scrumptious candy tiles as you travel through enchanted levels of immersive block bursting fun!

Rescue your favorite characters like Donkey, Gingy, Pinocchio, the Three Little Pigs, and more with epic power ups to make the best match! Will you defeat the mighty Lord Farquaad and save Shrek’s friends?

Mirror, mirror on the wall, is this not the most magical match-3 puzzle of them all?
